title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.8 - Agent identification card
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5001.8 - Agent identification card

State Regulations
A wallet-size agent identification card will be issued to
each licensed agent for presentation to bank tellers and others when picking up
or returning lottery tickets to authorized banks and depositories. No bank or
depository shall issue lottery tickets unless the agent, or the agent's
designee, presents an agent identification card bearing the authorized
signature of the sales agent or the sale agent's duly authorized
representative. Loss of the agent identification card must be reported
immediately by the agent to the commission and to the servicing
bank. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5001.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
